relating to runes (= magic marks or letters, especially the letters of an ancient alphabet cut into stone or wood in the past): a runic letter/alphabet/message ancient runic inscriptions See
rune
More examplesFewer examplesThe tree is hung with strange runic symbols.Written in runic characters running round the edge is the famous Anglo-Saxon poem.The stone circle seems to possess a strange runic energy.
